SRP.Q: On the Renewable Energy Adoption Rate, is the point for Thomas Inc Sustainability Initiative inside or outside the point for Fleming, Smith and Williams Sustainability Initiative?
SRP.A: On the Renewable Energy Adoption Rate, the point for Thomas Inc Sustainability Initiative is outside the point for Fleming, Smith and Williams Sustainability Initiative.

VPR.Q: On dimension Green Building Certification Rate, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Green Building Certification Rate, label {Fleming, Smith and Williams Sustainability Initiative} scores the highest.

VPR.Q: On dimension Renewable Energy Adoption Rate, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Renewable Energy Adoption Rate, label {Fleming, Smith and Williams Sustainability Initiative} scores the lowest.
